alert.note: Alert for Kane; Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 02 at 7:51PM MDT until September 02 at 8:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Western Kane County in southern Utah... Southeastern Washington County in southwestern Utah... * Until 845 PM MDT. * At 751 PM MDT, Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.25 inches are possible in the warned area, which could result in additional flooding in and around Hildale. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hildale and Short Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
